mapper.select: select path from profile where email = #{email} order by id desc;
mapper.delete: delete from profile where email = #{email} and path = #{path}
mapper.select: select u.email, u.nickname, u.profile, u.score, c.name blogname from user u left join config c on u.email = c.email where exists(select * from follow f where f.follower = #{email} and u.email = f.followed)
